name: incompatible
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: not able to exist or work with another person or thing because of basic differences
trans_examp.trans_cn: 不相容的；不兼容的；不能和谐相处的

example.eg: When we started living together we realized how incompatible we were - our interests were so different.
example.egtrans: 开始共同生活后，我们发现彼此是多么合不来——我们的兴趣差别太大了。

example.eg: Maintaining quality is incompatible with increasing output.
example.egtrans: 保持质量和增加产量是相互对立的。

example.eg: Any new video system that is incompatible with existing ones has little chance of success.
example.egtrans: 任何与现有系统不兼容的新视频系统都难以成功。
